title: G4 Support Looking for a Team, Whether for OOL or Not
body:
Hi Everyone,

My name is Obscurebreed, I'm a 24 year old gamer and I'm here to offer my life...errr....services to anyone who wishes to take me on. I am currently a G4 Support, with a ranged spectrum of different options (Janna, Karma, Leona, Blitz, Thresh) and willing to learn more and grow as a team. I've normally only been used to playing as a solo-unit, which may sound wierd as a support but hey...such is life :)

I am semi-flexible with game times, but not available anywhere between 4pm - 11pm AEDT on account of my running my own business between these hours. Pizza's dont make themselves ;) Thankfully, it should put me in the clear for scheduling of OOL games on weekends. Worst case scenario, I might miss the last round of each day (If it comes to that).

Hoping that someone gives this post a look over, and I'm happy for any 'Trial by Fire' or anything like that someone may have in store for me :)  Hit me up on here or send me through a message in-game. Cheers !
